## mande() function

Create a Mande instance

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function mande(baseURL: string, passedInstanceOptions?: OptionsRaw, fetchPolyfill?: Window['fetch']): MandeInstance;
```

## Example


```js
const users = mande('/api/users')
users.get('2').then(user => {

})
```
